name: TMERAT: the original
description:
- GENERALLY -

this concept was originally supposed to be " TMERAT " before it changed to " TMERAT: the car game " due to my shitty skills at game development, but now i'm less shitty so i made it again

- GAMEPLAY -

its so simple, just shoot your friends :) and btw only 4 people can join a single match

- IMPORTANT NOTES -

1. if a firewall notification pops up, just allow access so you can play the game. i swear i'm not trying to hack you its just because the game is multiplayer i think

2. you can only play this game with your friends, if you have some :(
